summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style Video Editor - All requested features working correctly. Top toolbar shows all 11 categories (Medien, Audio, Text, Sticker, Effekte, Übergänge, Untertitel, Filter, Anpassung, Vorlagen, KI-Avatar). Clicking categories changes left sidebar navigation. All AI feature panels (KI-Bild with Seedream 4.0, KI-Video with Bild-zu-Video/Text-zu-Video tabs, Text-zu-Sprache TTS, KI-Musik, Auto-Untertitel with Whisper) are working. Media import functionality, timeline, and preview panels are visible and functional.
passed_tests: Dashboard loads correctly with feature tiles
Project creation modal opens with Projektname, Auflösung, Bildfrequenz options
Project creation navigates to Editor view successfully
Top Toolbar shows all 11 categories: Medien, Audio, Text, Sticker, Effekte, Übergänge, Untertitel, Filter, Anpassung, Vorlagen, KI-Avatar
Clicking 'Audio' category changes left sidebar to show: Importieren, Deine, Musik, Soundeffekte, KI-Musik (NEU), Text-zu-Sprache (AI)
Clicking 'Text' category changes left sidebar to show: Text hinzufügen, Deine, Texteffekte, Textvorlage, Automatische UT (AI)
Clicking 'Untertitel' category changes left sidebar to show: Automatische UT (AI), Manuell hinzufügen, Song-Lyrics (AI), Untertitel-Stile
Clicking 'KI-Avatar' category changes left sidebar to show: Avatar erstellen (NEU), Bibliothek, Text-zu-Video (AI), Storyboard (AI)
KI-Bild panel shows: Seedream 4.0 model, prompt textarea, aspect ratio selector (9:16/16:9/1:1), Generieren button
KI-Video panel shows: Bild-zu-Video and Text-zu-Video tabs, Seedance 1.0 Fast model, duration/aspect ratio selectors, Generieren button
Text-zu-Sprache (TTS) panel shows: text input, character count, voice selection (Alloy/Echo/Nova/Onyx/Shimmer), Audio erstellen button
KI-Musik panel shows: description textarea with placeholder, Musik-Vorschlag button
Auto-Untertitel panel shows: OpenAI Whisper integration, Audio/Video hochladen button, language selector (Deutsch/Englisch/Spanisch), Untertitel generieren button
Media import functionality: Medien importieren button, Bild-zu-Video button, Text-zu-Video button visible
Timeline panel visible with: playhead, time markers, placeholder text 'Ziehe Elemente hierher'
Preview panel visible with time display (00:00:00:00 / 00:03:00:00)
Right panel shows Eigenschaften and KI-Assistent tabs
KI-Assistent panel shows: GPT-5.2 model selector, welcome message, quick suggestions, chat input
critical_code_review_comments: App runs in browser mode using localStorage for project storage (Electron APIs not available)
AI API calls use Emergent LLM Key - configured and ready for use
German language UI throughout the application
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
CapCut-style two-column layout in MediaInputPanel (180px navigation + content area) working correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested CapCut-style features are working: Top toolbar with 11 categories that change left sidebar navigation, AI feature panels (KI-Bild/Seedream 4.0, KI-Video with tabs, TTS, KI-Musik, Auto-Untertitel/Whisper), media import, timeline, preview, and KI-Assistent chat. The app runs in browser mode using localStorage. To navigate to Editor, create a new project using 'Neues Projekt erstellen' button and click 'Erstellen'. Use button[type='submit'] selector for reliable form submission.
